list.name: Default
list.comment: Sign in / out steps complete Sharedprefs stored and removed correctly

task.summary: Basic activity changes added for primary flow of the application. Test usage of recyclerview and adapter used within Tab1. Sign in is designed according to original spec, no functionality as of right now
Internationalisation (German, French, Spanish and English) support Android lint and analysis to conform to standard practices
TODO merge TextViews together for sign up to solve non-click area between method to make TextViews clickable Sign in branch created. master to remain working and runnable at all times
Improvement to activity stack between transitions Create RegisterActivity to handle new accounts CircularImageView for round image overlay (profile pictures)
Registration API using Futures and callbacks, no raw JSON or HTTP Account table in database with basic details Preliminary testing on creating accounts with duplicates
Reorganisation Cloud responses improved SharedPreferences (local storage) started, to-do login functionality
Constants defined for easier maintainability of certain fields
Login functionality more stable, better error checking Azure mobile service migrated to new instance
Sign in / out steps complete Sharedprefs stored and removed correctly
